meanings.definition: A stream or river flowing into a larger body of water.
meanings.sent1: The affluents joined together to form a mighty river.
meanings.sent2: The small affluents added to the grandeur of the main river.
meanings.sent3: The affluents decided to have a race to see who could reach the ocean first.
meanings.sent4: The affluents danced and twirled as they merged into the wide river.
meanings.sent5: The sparkling affluents cascaded down the hills, eager to meet the main river.

meanings.definition: A person who is wealthy or has a lot of money.
meanings.sent1: The affluents in the city lived in luxurious mansions.
meanings.sent2: She was known as one of the local affluents due to her expensive cars.
meanings.sent3: The affluents at the party were all dressed in designer clothes.
meanings.sent4: His generosity made him the richest of all the affluents in town.
meanings.sent5: The affluents' wealth shone brightly in their extravagant lifestyles.
